General.Name: Khgears International Limited
General.Description: Khgears International Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and sells gears and gearboxes in Asia, the United States, and Europe. It offers precision gears, such as spiral bevel and cylindrical gears, turbine worms, and synchronous belt wheels; precision hardware products, including camshafts, hammers, and anvils; planetary products, corners, and turbine worm gearboxes; and cup and top hat type products, and integrated harmonic drives. The company's products are primarily used in power and garden tools, industrial sewing machines, yacht industries, automobiles, medical machinery equipment, and industrial robots. Khgears International Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
